articles.description: Microsoft developers are generating thousands of security bugs a month. Read on to know what it is about
articles.content:
Microsoft has collected over 13 million bugs since 2001
At Microsoft, 47,000 developers are generating nearly 30,000 bugs a month and these vulnerabilities get stored across over 100 AzureDevOps and GitHub repositories to quickly spot critical bugs and stay … [+1837 chars]

articles.description: After almost 18 months, Epic Games has finally released Fortnite on the Google Play Store for all Android users. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content:
Fortnite requires an additional download of 7.4GB
Fortnite is one of the most popular battle royale games. The game is available on multiple platforms including Android, iOS PS4, PC, Xbox and Nintendo Switch. For smartphones, the game was first introduced in… [+1432 chars]

articles.title: Google Duo Adds Four New Features to Help Users Ease Through Covid-19 Lockdown - News18
articles.description: The stay-at-home and work from home orders prompted by the COVID-19 pandemic have witnessed video-calling numbers go through the roof.
articles.content: Google has started rolling out four new features in its video calling app Google Duo, along with a promise to add more soon. The search engine giant is rolling out a new video codec technology to improve video call quality and reliability, even on very low-ba… [+1040 chars]

articles.title: Skype Gets Cool Backgrounds For Your Video Calls; This Beach View is Perhaps Safer Than Zoom - News18
articles.description: These are available to all Skype users, after updating the app mind you, on Windows, Mac and Linux devices. The Skype version on the web browser will also get the new cool backgrounds right away.
articles.content: One of the features that made Zoom as popular as it is now in the video calls and video meetings ecosystem is the ability to add virtual backgrounds. You could make a call from the beach, from outer space, or the Starship Enterprise, to name a few. The little… [+2049 chars]
